This website is an aggregation of resources for Marine and Coastal Science Majors at UC Davis, but has content that is relevant to all marine science undergraduate students! These resources are intended to help students find research and professional development opportunities while increasing their understanding of academic and scientific culture.


##### Have questions? Contact the CMSI Lead Mentor, [Priya Shukla](contact.html).
